questions.consigne:
A)  I went to get a coffee and lost all the work I was doing. ( save the document )  
 B)  You ____.
questions.indication: Complete the sentences below to express criticism. Use the third conditional and the cues in brackets. Write the  full B response  (full sentence) in the field below each question.    Example)    A)  I was only just able to brake in time when a deer ran out in front of me. ( drive more slowly )    B)  If you’d been   driving more slowly, you wouldn’t have had to brake   so suddenly.

 B)  If ____ what she said.
